resources.string: HTLCatcher is a Flappy-Bird-inspired game where you have to navigate your player character through approaching obstacles as long as possible. The longer you manage to navigate through them, the more points you get. Additionally, you can try to catch passing HTL logos to get even more points.
Take a photo and get started!
(The app needs access to your camera for this)
You can control your avatar by tapping on the display. Upon every tap, your character jumps up a bit but then immediately falls back down due to gravitational affectation.
(The app needs access to your gallery for this)
